body_html:
I met the same issue.
Try to find where libcupti.so.9.0 (or different version) is and add it into LD_LIBRARY_PATH fixed this issue.
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH="/usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64:/usr/local/cuda-9.0/extras/CUPTI/lib64"
body_text:
I met the same issue.
Try to find where libcupti.so.9.0 (or different version) is and add it into LD_LIBRARY_PATH fixed this issue.
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH="/usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64:/usr/local/cuda-9.0/extras/CUPTI/lib64"
body:
I met the same issue.
Try to find where libcupti.so.9.0 (or different version) is and add it into LD_LIBRARY_PATH fixed this issue.
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH="/usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64:/usr/local/cuda-9.0/extras/CUPTI/lib64"
